casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christina Shea WALTERS No. 548A00-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Shelagh R. Kenney, Attorney at Law, Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Walters, Christina Shea Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. James E. Williams, Jr., Attorney at Law, Carrboro, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. James E. Coleman, Jr., Attorney at Law, Dallas, TX, for Becton, Charles, et al. Robert P. Mosteller, Attorney at Law, for Retired Members of NC Judiciary.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 30th of May 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Cumberland County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
